supporting_quotes: In July 1994 Cameron left his role as Special Adviser to work as the Director of Corporate Affairs at Carlton Communications.

metadata.timeline_reasoning: The position started in July 1994 when Cameron joined as Director of Corporate Affairs. He left in 1997 to run for Parliament but returned after his defeat, continuing in the same role. The position definitively ended in February 2001 when he resigned to run for Parliament again. Therefore, the overall tenure spans from 1994 to 2001, despite the brief interruption in 1997.
